title: Javascript in a nutshell
JavaScript is a scripting language used to create and control dynamic website content,
i.e. data validation, display popup messages, handling different events of DOM elements, modifying style of DOM elements etc.
JavaScript is mostly used on the front end, but it’s versatile enough to be used on back end infrastructure, too.
Overview of javascript:
Weakly Typed Language
<div class='info-text'>
• No explicit type assignment:
